scripts.client-dev: cd client && clear && npm run dev
scripts.client-stag: cd client && clear && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.dev: tmux new-session 'npm run client-dev' \; split-window 'npm run server-dev'
scripts.stag: tmux new-session 'npm run client-stag' \; split-window 'npm run server-stag'
